titles.title: 820 Behold Me Standing At The Door (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Behold Me standing at the door
And hear Me pleading evermore
With gentle voice
Oh heart of sin
May I come in
May I come in

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Behold Me standing at the door
And hear Me pleading evermore
Say weary heart oppressed with sin
May I come in
May I come in

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I bore the cruel thorns for thee
I waited long and patiently
Say weary heart oppressed with sin
May I come in
May I come in

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I would not plead with thee in vain
Remember all My grief and pain
I died to ransom thee from sin
May I come in
May I come in

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I bring thee joy from heaven above
I bring thee pardon peace and love
Say weary heart oppressed with sin
May I come in
May I come in
